document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-11
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING AMENDMENTS TO THE 1994 GENERAL PLAN MAP AND CONSISTENT AMENDMENTS TO THE ZONING ORDINANCE MAP REGARDING THE JAMES ROAD FIRE STATION PROPERTY AT 225 JAMES ROAD, AND AMENDING CHAPTER 19.05 AND 19.13 OF THE ZONING ORDINANCE TO ADD PUBLIC AMBULANCE SERVICE AS A USE CLASSIFICATION AND ADDING PUBLIC AMBULANCE SERVICE AS A PERMITTED USE IN THE PUBLIC DISTRICT
